cpu-usage-thresholds.description: List of Configuration of the CPU overload threshold used.

cpu-usage-threshold.description: Configure or cancel the CPU overload threshold used for patch installation or uninstallation.

slot.description: Specifies the slot ID of the board for which the CPU usage threshold is to be set.

patch-infos.description: List of operational data of a patch packet information.

patch-info.description: Operational data of a patch packet information.

name.description: Name of the current patch package.

version.description: Version of the current patch package.

state.description: Status of the current patch package.

runtime.description: Run time of the current patch package.

path.description: Path of the current patch package.

operations.description: List of operational state of making the cold patch take effect.

operation.description: Operational state of making the cold patch take effect.

position.description: Object to make the cold patch take effect.

position-type.description: Object type to make the cold patch take effect.

upgrade-mode.description: Operating method to make the cold patch take effect.

next-startup-patchs.description: List of operational data of next startup patch packet informations.

next-startup-patch.description: Operational data of a patch startup packet information.

name.description: Name of a next startup patch package.

operation-schedules.description: List of operational state of patch.

schedule.description: Value of the patch operation process.

fail-reason.description: Cause of the patch operation failure.

download-package-schedule.description: Operational data of package downloading progress.

schedule.description: The schedule of file download, for example, progress (%).

download-package-load-path.description: Operational data of load path before downloading a normal patch package.

file-path.description: File path. If the value of file-type node is normal, the file path of normal patch will be /.
